Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch: Do not try to drag me into festivities. I am here by coincidence, observing the aether.
Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch_spouse: Do you seriously intend to participate in that children's egg game?$6#$e#I don't know what is worse: to win against them, or lose.

Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch: Oh, no. Do NOT get any ideas.#$b#Absolutely not.$6
Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch_spouse: ...I suppose you may have a dance.#$b#When there isn't such a risk of getting stepped on in the course of the townspeople's' frolicking.$6

Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch: If you've brought something for the pot, it had best be delicious...#$b#Or be sure to make it a good show.$u
I'm sorry, did I invite you to speak to me? I am here to observe the migration of the Medusozoa, not mingle with the townsfolk.$6
Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch_spouse: They are beautiful, are they not? Yet I fear this will be one more sight lost to time.#$e#...Never mind my ramblings. I should be glad to share this with you.$9

Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch: If you're going to tempt fate and block off your only medical facility with a display of beasts, at least get something a little more exciting than this.
Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch_spouse: Indulging in the festivities? I may be convinced to share a taste.$u

Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch: Was entering my name into this little celebration your idea of a joke?
Entries.Visorlights.EmetSelch-spouse: I hardly think my presence is required in this celebration. It is not as if I am considered 'part of the town'.#$b#But if I must make an appearance as your husband...
